SOLID Data for Research

Contribute your data in SOLID to research with full control and privacy preserved.

Github
Get Started [WIP]

Fetch data files from Solid Pods

Read the data files from your own Pod or public data files from other's Pods.

Create new data using existing schema

You are able to create a new data file and add triples to the file. You can also search existing schema for your triples.

Post a data request for conducting your own research

Post a data request with your research purpose, requested data elements, data usage period, the number of participants you need, and what type of analysis. Data request will be saved publicly in your own Pod.

Contribute to research by participating in a data request

View and search all data requests. By approving the data request, you give the "READ" access of your specific data file to the requester. You are able to indicate until when you want to participate in this study. Please note that you are always the owner of your data and have full control of your data.
